
= gammarus Homarus =

Homarus gammarus , known as the European lobster or common lobster , is a species of clawed lobster from the eastern Atlantic Ocean , Mediterranean Sea and parts of the Black Sea . Homarus gammarus , known as the European lobster or common lobster , is a species of clawed lobster from the eastern Atlantic Ocean , Mediterranean Sea and parts of the Black Sea . = = climate and Geography = =

= Mountains Creek Trout =

= = Geology = =

valleys desert @-@ high , wide by separated ranges mountain south – north long form that blocks fault parallel of series a by characterized is which , States United Western the of Basin Great or Province Range and Basin the within lie mountains The .
range the of sides eastern and southern the along escarpments steep with blocks tilted and uplifted are Mountains Creek Trout The .

today is Mountain Steens where stood once that volcano shield a from basalt of mostly composed are Mountains Creek Trout The .

= Gauthier Éva =

teacher voice and soprano @-@ mezzo American @-@ Canadian a was ) 1958 , 20 December – 1885 , 20 September ( Gauthier Éva .

music to brought singing her qualities many the for praised was Gauthier .

= = career Singing = =

= = = Java to Move = = =

= Island 's Sullivan of Battle =

rebels American from city the capture to attempt British first the during , Carolina South , Charleston near place took It .
1780 in siege British successful more a to owing , Charleston of Siege First the as to referred sometimes also is It .

supervision provide would , war the of theater Continental southern the commanding , Lee Charles General .

construction log palmetto 's fort the of nature spongy the and soil sandy the to due effect little had bombardment naval The .
bombardment 's day entire an after withdrew which , fleet British the on damage significant wrought defenders the by fire Careful .

= Zhengyan Hu =

c ; 胡正言 : Chinese ( Zhengyan Hu .
publisher and printmaker , artist Chinese a was ) 1674 – 1584 .
work own his of records as well as texts academic producing , publisher a primarily was but , carving @-@ seal and , painting Chinese traditional , calligraphy in worked He .
dynasty Qing the to dynasty Ming the from transition the during Nanjing in lived Hu .
office political minor than more anything held never and , post the declined but , Emperor Hongguang the of court rump the at position a offered was he , loyalist Ming A .
1645 in death and capture 's emperor the after society from retired largely he that such was dynasty the to loyalty his and , seal personal 's Emperor Hongguang the design , however , did He .
enterprise this in family his of members several employed he and , techniques embossing and printing colour @-@ multi various practised he which in , Studio Bamboo Ten the called house publishing academic an operated and owned He .
form art this in achievable previously not were which colour of gradations delicate to leading , printmaking colour in techniques new pioneered Studio Bamboo Ten the at work 's Hu .
years 200 around for print in remained which primer 's artist an , Calligraphy and Painting of Manual Studio Bamboo Ten The entitled painting of manual his for known best is Hu .
papers writing decorative and , poetry on books , texts medical and academic , catalogues seal published also studio His .
brothers his and Hu by prefaced and edited were these of Many .

= = Biography = =

1585 early or 1584 in Province Anhui , County Xiuning in born was Hu .
Huoshan and 'an Lu around areas the in medicine practised they while them with travelled he 30 turned he after and , physicians were ) 無所 , Wusuo name art , 正心 ( Zhengxin brother elder and father his Both .
century 19th the of half second the in only occur this to attesting sources earliest the though , doctor a also was himself Zhengyan that stated commonly is It .
Wu wife his with lived he where Nanjing to moved had Hu , 1619 By .
artists minded @-@ like for house @-@ meeting a as served , wall city northern the within just located hill a , ) Ge Beiji as known also now , 雞籠山 ( Jilongshan on home Their .
property the of front in grew that plants bamboo ten the after , ) 十竹齋 , Shizhuzhai ( Studio Bamboo Ten the it named Hu .
) 致果 name courtesy , 其毅 ( Qiyi and ) 其樸 ( Qipu sons his and ) 子著 , Zizhu name art , 正行 ( Zhengxing and Zhengxin brothers two his including artisans ten employed he where , business printing his for headquarters the as functioned It .

dignitaries numerous for seals personal producing , carver @-@ seal noted a was Zhengyan Hu .

= = Studio Bamboo Ten = =

publisher a primarily was Hu , carver @-@ seal and artist an as reputation his Despite .

novels or plays as such fiction narrative of works publish not did Studio Bamboo Ten the , area the in publishers other Unlike .

= River Hongorai the of Battle =

forces Japanese and Zealand New , Australian involved and War World Second the during place took River Hongorai the of Battle The .

= = Background = =


= = = situation Strategic = = =

island the garrisoning Australians of force small the from it capturing , 1942 early in Bougainville on landed had forces Japanese .
Area Pacific Southwest the and Australia , States United the between communication of lines Allied the attack to and Islands Solomon northern the in operations conduct to it using , island the on airbases several developed subsequently had They .
Rabaul around base Japanese the neutralising for vital was Bougainville that determined planners Allied , 1943 throughout and , Guinea New Papua in base naval and garrison Japanese major the , Rabaul protect helped also bases These .
1943 November in , Bay Augusta Empress of north , island the of coast western the on , Torokina Cape at landing amphibious an conducted Marines US .
perimeter strong a establishing , Torokina around position their consolidating began who troops Army US of garrison a by replaced been had Marines US the , attack @-@ counter initial an After .

= = History = =
